name: Distress Signal (FreckledFemme)
description:
Controls: This game is controlled only with the Up or W key. "Walk" forward through the scenes and events in the story! This project is a linear environment piece - enjoy the journey :)

This game is a gift for CommunistSister as part of the Bitsy Secret Santa Jam!

The prompt words were: Radio, Ruins, Map

Game made in Bitsy 7.2 with use of Borksy Hacks

Special thanks to Adam Ledoux for Bitsy

Cephalopodunk for the AMAZING background hack

and AurySystem for walking me through how to edit code - I learned a lot working on this!

I made all the art in Aseprite, then used the above mentioned hacks to insert the images directly as backgrounds. All the walls, items, and sprites are invisible so you can focus on the imagery and enjoy the dialogue!

All sound effects come from Freesound.org and are available for open source use.
